title: Learning Analytics Integration Design Course for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in science and basic data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Provision of a mobile learning environment to enhance data-driven instructional design capabilities for current science practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three stages of science education design processes utilizing learning analytics systems
Learners can diagnose educational effectiveness and propose improvements using learning data visualization tools
Learners can produce microlearning content applying data management layer design principles in technology-based learning environments
Learners can implement and share learning analytics-integrated design outcomes through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
